text: The 2014–15 NHL season was the 98th season of operation (97th season of play) of the National Hockey League (NHL). Thirty teams competed. There were 82 games in the regular season from October 8, 2014 to June 15, 2015. The 2015 Stanley Cup playoffs began on April 15, 2015, and ended on June 15, 2015. The Chicago Blackhawks won the Stanley Cup. ==Other websites== *NHL.com Category:National Hockey League seasons Category:2014 in ice hockey Category:2015 in ice hockey Category:2014 in North America Category:2015 in North America
title: 2014–15 NHL season
